title: What's the deal with Impact?
body:
I know he's going to randomly be swapping with Ray, but does Riot have some information we don't? 

He dropped to half points just before NA locked in for week 2, but he's at full points for week 3. 

Opinions on whether or not  Impact is worth the risk?

replies.body:
It depends on how Ray does from what i see.  Impact is the insurance policy from what ray might do.


All i can say is... Top Die.

I think it also counts on whether or not he's the start? not sure

Impact is listed as their top lane starter for every series on esports. We pretty much have no good information to go off of other than C9 coach is trying to keep it unpredictable. So much uncertainty.
